name: Marina Satti
description: '''Marina Satti''' ({{langx|el|Μαρίνα Σάττι}}; born 26 December 1986) is a Greek singer, composer, music producer, and actress. Her music fuses [[Greek traditional music|traditional Greek]] and [[Balkan music|Balkan]] sounds with modern [[Pop music|pop]], [[hip-hop]], and [[Electronic music|electronic]] production. She released her first single, "{{lang|el-Latn|Koupes|i=no}}", in 2016; and her first album, ''YENNA'', in 2022. Satti represented Greece at the [[Eurovision Song Contest 2024]] with her song "[[Zari (song)|Zari]]", finishing in 11th place.
